title.rendered: Triphala 120 Tablet for Overall Wellness, Healthy Digestion

content.rendered:
• These tablets are a potent blend of Harde, Baheda, and Amla extract, renowned for their powerful health benefits.
  • Enriched with antioxidants, they help combat oxidative stress and promote overall vitality.

Key Benefits:

  • Gut Health: Improves digestion and gut health, providing relief from bloating and digestive discomfort.
  • Natural Laxative: May act as a natural laxative, promoting regular bowel movements.
  • Combat Oxidative Stress: The antioxidants help neutralize free radicals, support overall health and prevent cell damage.
  • Weight Management: Promotes a healthy metabolism, supporting digestion and contributing to effective weight management.
  • Natural Detoxification: Helps eliminate accumulated toxins from the body, aiding in natural detoxification processes.
  • Anti-Inflammatory Properties: Reduces inflammation, supports overall joint and body health.
  • Cancer Protection: May help protect the body against certain types of cancers.
  • Dental Health: Protects against dental diseases and cavities, promoting healthier teeth and gums.

Directions: Take 1 tablet twice daily preferably after meals or as recommended by the physician. For better results, it should be taken with warm water.

Ingredients: Amla Extract, Bibhitaki Extract, Haritaki Extract.

Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
